笓字的基本解释

笓
pí
捕虾的竹器。
用竹或荆柳编织的障碍物。

笓
bì
古同“篦”，篦子。
排列；编排。

笓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pí］
［《廣韻》部迷切，平齊，並。］
(1)竹制的取虾器具。
(2)笓篱。用竹或荆柳编织的遮隔物。参见“笓籬戰格”。
[②]［bì］
［《集韻》毗至切，去至，並。］
同“篦1”。
见“竹篦”。

笓字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　笓； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页879第07
【廣韻】部迷切【集韻】騈迷切，?音鼙。取鰕竹器。【博雅】篝、筌謂之笓，可以約物。　又【集韻】頻脂切，音琵。義同。　又【集韻】【韻會】?毗至切，音鼻。櫛屬，與枇同。　又【集韻】薄必切，音邲。次也。　【集韻】或作篦。亦作箄。

笓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
笓字的起名意思

暂无。

笓
Basic explanation of words
笓
pí
Bamboo utensils for catching shrimps.
Obstacles woven from bamboo or wattle.
笓
bì
The ancient same "grate", the grate.
Arrange; arrange.
笓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pí］
["Guangyun" department fan cut, flat, and. ]
(1) Shrimp taking utensils made of bamboo.
(2) Wu Lei. A shelter made of bamboo or wattle. See "Gui Li Zhan Ge".
[②]［bì］
["Ji Yun" Adjacent to cut, go to, and merge. ]
Same as "Grate 1".
See "bamboo grate".
笓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　笓; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 879 No. 07
[Guang Yun] Bu Miqie [Ji Yun] Fan Miqie,? Yin Ku. Take the bamboo ware. [Bo Ya] Bon and 筌 are called 笓, which can be about things.　[Jiyun] Frequency fat cut, sound pi. The same meaning.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Adjacent to cutting, sound nose. Compressed genus, the same as Pi.　[Jiyun] Thin must be cut, sound is pounded. Times also.　【Jiyun】or as a grate. Also for the Yan.
笓
